RumorFact.Text: The escape pod was launched from the vessel to protect the Cactus Teleporter.

ExploreFact.Text: I have found a Nomai escape pod in the centre of Dwarf's Shallow.

RumorFact.Text: There is a strange device inside the escape pod that I can pick up.

ExploreFact.Text: A handheld device of Nomai design that I can collect from the Dwarf's Shallow escape pod.
It can be used to teleport cacti. I just have to walk up to any cactus while holding it, press the button, and then select a destination for the cactus.
I will not be able to add new co-ordinates to the cactus teleporter, unless I find a cactus professional.

RumorFact.Text: The cat owner gave me the co-ordinates to the vase that his pet cactus belongs in.
